original_text: The Jews did not agree with Paul and they insulted him. So he shook the dirt off his clothes at them. He said to them, ‘If God punishes you, then you have caused it to happen. It will not be because of me. Now I will go to the Gentiles and I will teach them God's message.’
korean_text: 그들이 대적하여 비방하거늘 바울이 옷을 털면서 이르되 너희 피가 너희 머리로 돌아갈 것이요 나는 깨끗하니라 이후에는 이방인에게로 가리라 하고

sentences.original_text: The Jews did not agree with Paul
So he shook the dirt off his clothes at them
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 자기 옷에서 먼지를 털어버렸다

sentences.original_text: then you have caused it to happen
It will not be because of me
Now I will go to the Gentiles
and I will teach them God's message
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나는 그들에게 하나님의 메시지를 가르칠 것이다
